profile: Serving all of central Ontario from  The Muskokas -Peel Region- York Region - Dufferin Region -Simcoe Region - Georgetown -Milton , Closets by Design is the industry leader in custom manufactured organizational systems. We design, build and install custom closets, garage cabinets and flooring, home offices, laundries, pantries, and much more. From our no obligation in-home consultation, custom tailored designs, and the highest quality canadian product construction, our products offer the best value in the industry. Check us out at barrie.closetsbydesign.com.

profile:
Imagine your home totally organized! At Closets by Design, we work to simplify your life by designing, building, and installing custom closets, garage cabinets, home offices, laundries, pantries, and much more. With a wide selection of finishes, accessories, and hardware, you will get the customized look you have always dreamed of and you can rely on our three decades of experience for total customer satisfaction. From our no obligation in-home consultation, custom tailored designs, and high quality product construction, we offer excellent value. For service in Toronto and Durham including Toronto Downtown, North York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Uxbridge, Newcastle, Peterborough, and Bowmanville visit our website to book your free consultation today or visit our showroom in Toronto located at 667 Mount Pleasant Rd. or Scarborough 780 Birchmount Rd, Unit 8.    
Closets by Design: Quality, beauty, and commitment are built in!

profile:
Invincible Garage specializes in designing your garage to look luxurious and well organized. We design cabinetry to meet your needs,  making everything easily accessible and manageable. Creating lighting that meets every family members needs,
whether its the handy man at work or kids simply practicing with their band in the garage, we have what best suits you. Painting skills that will add a fresh new look to your garage and applying floor coating that gives your garage a look that makes friends and neighbours think you spent millions. By making all these upgrades to your garage, you are adding more market value to your home and creating a space that you will enjoy every time you step into your car .

profile:
At Garage Tailors we challenge the status quo in the home organization space, so that we can do our part to help make our clients day a little less stressful.  Our operating principles are trust, honesty, transparency and value.  The experience for our clients must be positive and one that they have to tell their friends about. 
Our philosophy is that every families garage transformation, whether it's solely a floor coating to a full renovation, be designed and constructed to be within an agreed upon budget and schedule, that is how we work with you. From the initial estimate to when we say thank you for your business, we believe that we can meet all your expectations.
We service the GTA and all the surrounding areas.

profile:
Hang-Ups Custom Closets Inc. is proudly owned and operated by John Tzannis. With over 25 years experience, John is an expert craftsman in his field of custom millwork and he stands behind and guarantees all the work he does. His expertise speaks for itself.

***

*WSIB Insured and Bonded

***

Our goal is to maximize your space and offer suggestions on how to use space you might not have considered.

***

We will send a professional designer to your home to design whatever project you have in mind.

***

We design a 3D computer layout of your space so that you can see your project before it’s started.

***

Call today for a free in-home consultation: 905-738-8218
